Explanations about Options.--build:
Creates a debian archive from the filesystem tree stored in binary-directory.
 binary-directory must have a DEBIAN subdirectory, which contains the control
 information files such as the control file itself. This directory will not appear
 in the binary package's filesystem archive, but instead the files in it will be put
 in the binary package's control information area.

Answers.MP Summary: copy files to and from archives

Explanations about Options.-v:
Print the name of each file to stderr as it is processed. With -t, provide a
 detailed listing of each file.
Explanations about Options.-p: Pass-through mode. See above for description.
Explanations about Options.-d: (i and p modes) Create directories as necessary.
Explanations about Options.-m:
(i and p modes) Set file modification time on created files to match those in the
 source.
